title: Methane emissions (kt of CO2 equivalent)
name: en.atm.meth.kt.ce
readme: Methane emissions are those stemming from human activities such as agriculture and from industrial methane production.

fields.description: Methane emissions are those stemming from human activities such as agriculture and from industrial methane production.
